name: Boiled Eggs
ingredients: Enough – Water (enough to cover eggs by an inch or two)
instructions: Lower the heat slightly so  eggs don’t crack due to movement but keep water at a gentle boil.
Start the timer – 6 minutes for runny yolks, 8 minutes for soft boiled, 10 minutes for classic hard boiled, 15 minutes for unpleasant rubbery whites and powdery dry yolks.
Transfer into a large bowl with ice cold water.
Once cooled, roll the eggs on a hard surface (before cracking) to release the layer between the egg and the shell (the dutch trick)
Peel the egg starting at the base
